messages.message:
Hi Team, in addition to this we still see substantial differences between the outputs of an advanced prompt in build mode and a prompt used in converse mode.

This is very confusing for the user. In general, converse prompts seem to give much better outputs.

Is there a plan to ensure there is extraction parity between Converse and Build Advanced Mode prompts?

Completely echo this. They really shouldn’t be super separate experiences anyway. For instance, as a user I’d want to be able to go from converse into Build. Or simply download my converse results into excel
Acknowledging this. cc @Hari let's discuss this later in our 1:1
Just adding to this. I had the problem in a workshop today. The lack of consistency  between chat and build is one of the biggest problems for me when demoing the platform at the moment.
